Sentencas: The present work describes the development of a glass-ceramic in SiO2-BaO-ZnO-B2O3-Al2O3 system.
Titulo: Thermal, structural and crystallization kinetics of SiO2-BaO-ZnO-B2O3-Al2O3 glass samples as a sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: The prepared glass samples were found to have good compatibility to act as a sealant in planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) in terms of coefficient of thermal expansion (TEC) and glass transition temperature (T-g).
Titulo: Thermal, structural and crystallization kinetics of SiO2-BaO-ZnO-B2O3-Al2O3 glass samples as a sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: The crystallization kinetics of present glass samples were investigated by various characterization techniques such as differential thermal analyzer (DTA), Dilatometery, X-Ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Thermal, structural and crystallization kinetics of SiO2-BaO-ZnO-B2O3-Al2O3 glass samples as a sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: The crystallization behavior of the chosen glass samples was influenced by replacing B2O3 with Al2O3.
Titulo: Thermal, structural and crystallization kinetics of SiO2-BaO-ZnO-B2O3-Al2O3 glass samples as a sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: With the addition of Al2O3 there is increase in glass transition temperature (T-g) and glass crystallization temperature (T-c).
Titulo: Thermal, structural and crystallization kinetics of SiO2-BaO-ZnO-B2O3-Al2O3 glass samples as a sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: Also with the addition of Al2O3 crystallization phenomenon is hindered.
Titulo: Thermal, structural and crystallization kinetics of SiO2-BaO-ZnO-B2O3-Al2O3 glass samples as a sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: XRD and SEM study was done at various temperatures for different time durations.
Titulo: Thermal, structural and crystallization kinetics of SiO2-BaO-ZnO-B2O3-Al2O3 glass samples as a sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: The detail of the above discussed study is done in the present paper.
